txt.en: 'Elfsige has more skill while mounted than any of you, and if he is making this wager he thinks he has more skill than I as well. I do not think our chance of victory is very high, but there is always a possibility of victory when good-hearted folk try their hardest to succeed.\n\n'Even when newly-trained on the back of war-steeds against a seasoned veteran of the plains of Rohan. Maybe.'
